name: text-rewrap
title: Text Rewrap
description: Rewraps Text at a given width
author: rembridge

preferences.name: defaultWidth
preferences.title: Default Width
preferences.description: Default width for text wrapping (leave blank for no wrapping)

preferences.name: defaultCopyToClipboard
preferences.label: Default Copy to Clipboard
preferences.description: Whether to copy the result to clipboard by default

commands.name: text-rewrap-form
commands.title: Text Rewrap from Form
commands.description: Rewraps Text provided in the form at the chosen width

commands.name: text-rewrap-clipboard
commands.title: Text Rewrap from Clipboard
commands.description: Rewraps text from clipboard at the chosen width

commands.name: text-rewrap-selection
commands.title: Text Rewrap from Selection
commands.description: Rewraps text from currently highlighted selection at the chosen width

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
